Verses: 1 egipthin Baaram. Idho, Karththar Vegamaana Megaththinmel Eri Egipthukku Varuvaar; Appozhudhu Egipthin Vikkiragangal Avarukku Munbaagak Kulungum, Egipthin Irudhayam Thanakkulle Karaindhupogum.
2 sagodharanode Sagodharanum, Snegidhanode Snegidhanum, Pattanaththode Pattanamum Raajyaththode Raajyamum Yuththampannumpadiyaai, Egipthiyarai Egipthiyarode Por Kalakkappannuven.

3 adhinaal Egipthiyarudaiya Aavi Avargalukkul Sorndhupogum; Avargal Aalosanaiyai Muzhugippogap Pannuven; Appozhudhu Vikkiragangalaiyum, Mandhiravaadhigalaiyum Sannadhakkaarargalaiyum, Kurisollugiravargalaiyum Theduvaargal.
4 naan Egipthiyaraik Kadinamaana Adhipadhiyin Kaiyil Oppippen; Kadooramaana Raajaa Avargalai Aaluvaanendru Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
5 appozhudhu Kadalin Thanneergal Kuraindhu, Nadhiyum Vatri Varandupom.
6 aarugalaith Thiruppividuvaargal; Aranippaana Agazhigal Verumaiyaagi Varandupom; Korukkaiyum Naanalum Vaadum.
7 nadhiyoraththilum Nadhimugaththilumirukkira Madalulla Sedigalum, Nadhiyaruge Vidhaikkappatta Yaavum Ularndhupom; Adhu Parakkadikkappattu Illaadhepom.
8 meenpidikkiravargal Perumoochchuviduvaargal, Nadhiyile Thoondilpodugira Yaavarum Dhukkippaargal; Thanneergalinmel Valaigalai Veesugiravargal Saliththuppovaargal.
9 melliya Sanalaip Pakkuvappaduththugiravargalum, Sallaakkalai Neygiravargalum Naanuvaargal.
10 meen Valarkkira Kulangalaik Koolikku Anaikkattugira Anaivarudaiya Anaikkattugalum Udaindhupom.

11 sovaanpattanaththin Prabukkalaanavargal Moodargal; Paarvonudaiya Gnaanamulla Aalosanaikkaararin Aalosanai Madhiyeenamaayitru: Naan Gnaanigalin Puththiran, Naan Poorva Raajaakkalin Kumaaran Endru Paarvonudane Eppadi Sollugireergal?
12 avargal Enge? Un Gnaanigal Enge? Senaigalin Karththar Egipthaikkuriththup Pannina Yosanaiyai Avargal Unakkuth Therivikkattum; Alladhu Thaangale Arindhukollattum.
13 sovaan Prabukkal Moodaraanaargal; Noppin Prabukkal Mosamponaargal; Egipthaiyum Adhin Koththiraththalaivaraiyum Vazhithappappannugiraargal.

14 karththar Adhin Naduvil Thaarumaarugalin Aaviyai Varappanninaar; Aanadhukondu Veriyan Vaandhipanni, Thallaadith Thirigiradhupola, Avargal Egipthai Adhin Ellaa Seygaiyilum Thallaadith Thiriyappannugiraargal.
15 egipthil Thalaiyaagilum Vaalaagilum Kilaiyaagilum Naanalaagilum Seyyum Velai Ondrumiraadhu.
16 akkaalaththile Egipthiyar Pendugalaippolirundhu, Senaigalin Karththar Thangalmel Asaikkum Kaiyasaivile Anji Nadunguvaargal.
17 senaigalin Karththar Avargalukku Virodhamaaga Nirnayiththukkonda Aalosanaiyinimiththam Yoodhaavin Dhesam Egipthiyarukku Bayangaramaayirukkum; Thanakkul Adhai Ninaikkiravanevanum Thidukkiduvaan.
18 akkaalaththile Egipthudhesaththilirukkum Aindhu Pattanangal Kaanaan Baashaiyaip Pesi, Senaigalin Karththarai Munnittu Aanaiyidum; Avaigalil Ondru Nirmoolamaana Pattanam Ennappadum.
19 akkaalaththile Egipthudhesaththin Naduvile Karththarukku Oru Palipeedamum, Adhin Ellaiyaruge Karththarukku Oru Sthambamum Undaayirukkum.

20 adhu Egipthu Dhesaththile Senaigalin Karththarukku Adaiyaalamum Saatchiyumaayirukkum; Odukkugiravargalinimiththam Avargal Karththarainokkik Kooppiduvaargal; Appodhu Avargalukku Oru Ratchaganaiyum, Oru Belavaanaiyum Anuppi Avargalai Viduvippaar.

21 appozhudhu Karththar Egipthiyarukku Ariyappaduvaar; Egipthiyar Karththarai Akkaalaththile Arindhu, Avarukkup Paligalodum Kaanikkaigalodum Aaraadhanaiseydhu, Karththarukkup Poruththanaigalaippanni Avaigalai Seluththuvaargal.
22 karththar Egipthiyarai Vaadhaiyinaal Adippaar; Adiththu Gunamaakkuvaar; Avargal Karththaridaththil Mananthirumbuvaargal; Appozhudhu Avargal Vinnappaththaik Kettu, Avargalaik Gunamaakkuvaar.
23 akkaalaththile Egipthilirundhu Aseeriyaavukkup Pogira Perumpaadhai Undaayirukkum; Aseeriyar Egipthukkum, Egipthiyar Aseeriyaavukkum Vandhu, Egipthiyar Aseeriyarodunkooda Aaraadhanai Seyvaargal.
24 akkaalaththile Isravel Egipthodum Aseeriyaavodum Moondraavadhaaga Boomiyin Naduvil Aaseervaadhamaayirukkum.

25 avargalaik Kuriththu Senaigalin Karththar: Egipthiyaraagiya En Janamum, Aseeriyaraagiya En Karaththin Kiriyaiyum, Isravelaraagiya En Sudhandharamum Aaseervadhikkappattadhu Endru Solli, Avargalai Aaseervadhippaar.
